welcome.headline: HI, WELCOME IN!
paragraphs: Never been here before? We're so glad you found us!
The Knot is a locally owned climbing gym in Gainesville, Florida that strives to cultivate a community-centered approach to fitness.
Check out our video to learn more about our facility and getting started on the wall or swing by to chat with our staff!

dayPass.headline: DAY PASSES
paragraphs: Although we are primarily a members-focused gym, we offer day passes during limited hours.
If you don't have your own gear, you can rent ours for $5 extra; includes chalk, shoes, & a harness if you're belay certified.
hoursText: Day passes are only sold Monday through Friday from 10AM - 3PM.
Must be purchased at the front desk - come check us out!

activitiesIntro:
Never climbed before? No problem! We have a variety of walls & classes for all skill levels.

At our facility, bouldering is the most accessible activity for beginners - pop in for a quick orientation & you'll be on the wall in no time.

activityCards.title: Bouldering
activityCards.description:
Six areas of bouldering spread across 7,000 square feet. Each area is unique, offering a variety of angles and roofs.

Perfect for beginners or seasoned pros. Need a little more instruction? Take a peek at our Intro to Climbing class
activityCards.imageAlt: Climber getting started on the wall

activityCards.title: Top-Rope
activityCards.description:
17 top-rope anchors with over 30 unique routes to choose from.

Top-roping is a partner activity that requires belay-certification prior to participation. Want to reach new heights? Check out our belay class with a member or schedule one of our private belayers.

activityCards.title: Classes
activityCards.description:
Learn climbing basics, get in a quick workout, or tap in to your flow with one of our many class offerings.

Check out our full schedule for class times & more info!
